meanings.definition: To dial a telephone number again in order to reach the same person or service.
meanings.sent1: I kept redialling my friend's number until she finally answered.
meanings.sent2: When the call didn't go through, I had to redialling the number.
meanings.sent3: Redialling the number felt like a never-ending game of phone tag.
meanings.sent4: She redialled her ex's number, hoping for a different outcome.
meanings.sent5: The sound of redialling echoed through the room as she tried to connect.

meanings.definition: The act of dialing a telephone number again in order to reach the same person or service.
meanings.sent1: After multiple rediallings, she finally got through to customer service.
meanings.sent2: The redialling of the number became a routine whenever the line was busy.
meanings.sent3: His constant redialling of the number amused his friends.
meanings.sent4: The redialling of the number symbolized her determination to connect.
meanings.sent5: The repetitive redialling was a reminder of the importance of persistence.
